actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Reported to House from the Committee on Armed Services with amendment, H. Rept. 96-605.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide that certain full-time training duty of members of the National Guard shall be considered as active duty for training in Federal service for the purpose of laws providing benefits for members of the National Guard and their dependents and beneficiaries.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Stipulates that certain full-time training or duty performed by a member of the Army National Guard or the Air National Guard shall be creditable as active duty for training in Federal service as a Reserve of the Army or Air Force for benefit purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide that certain full-time training duty of members of the National Guard shall be considered as active duty for training in Federal service for the purpose of laws providing benefits for members of the National Guard and their dependents and beneficiaries.
